Daniel D Stuart

If you are interested in my publications a list is provided below. They can also be found on my ResearchGate, or ORCID pages.

Publications

  1. Intelligent Hydrogen Gas Monitoring in Natural Gas/Hydrogen Blending
  2. Probing Herbicide Toxicity to Algae ( Selenastrum capricornutum ) by Lipid Profiling with Machine Learning and Microchip/MALDI-TOF Mass Spectrometry
  3. Surface plasmon resonance imaging (SPRi) in combination with machine learning for microarray analysis of multiple sclerosis biomarkers in whole serum
  4. Lipidomic Profiling of Algae with Microarray MALDI-MS toward Ecotoxicological Monitoring of Herbicide Exposure
  5. Detection of Multiple Sclerosis Biomarkers in Serum by Ganglioside Microarrays and Surface Plasmon Resonance Imaging
  6. Plasmonic Gold Templates Enhancing Single Cell Lipidomic Analysis of Microorganisms
  7. Graphene Oxide-Nanocarriers for Fluorescent Sensing of Calcium Ion Accumulation and Direct Assessment of Ion-Induced Enzymatic Activities in Cells
